prefix.description: The prefix for record names created by the template file

timeout.description: The timeout for the asyn port

parent_class.description: The parent class for the ParamSet.h

parameters.description: The parameters to make into an IOC

description.description: Description of what this Parameter is for

index_name.description: Override name of index variable in source code (defaults to name)

drv_info.description: Info string for drvUserCreate for dynamically created parameters

access.description:
What access does the user have. One of:

    - R: Read only value that cannot be set. E.g. chipTemperature on a detector,
      or isHomed for a motor
    - W: Write only value that can be written to, but there is no current value.
      E.g. reboot on a detector, or overwriteCurrentPosition for a motor
    - RW: Read and Write value that can be written to and read back.
      E.g. acquireTime on a detector, or velocity of a motor

demand_auto_updates.description: Should demand update when readback changes?

read_record_suffix.description: The read record suffix, if not given then use $(name)_RBV

write_record_suffix.description: The write record suffix, if not given then use $(name)

initial.description: The initial value of the parameter

read_widget.description: Widget to use for read record

write_widget.description: Widget to use for write record

axis.description: Traces with same axis name will appear on same axis, plotted against 'x' trace if it exists, or indexes if not. Only one traces with axis='x' allowed.

widgets.description: For each column, what widget should be repeated for every row

widget.description: What widget should be used for each item

layout.description: How to layout children on screen

labelled.description: If True use names of children as labels
